csc143.sudoku

Class SudokuBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • csc143.sudoku.SudokuBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SudokuCore, SudokuStub

    public abstract class SudokuBase
extends java.util.Observable
    SudokoBase provides the dimensions to create a sudoku board.
    Version:
    2015-07-11
    Author:
    Bob McHenry based on provided code.

      • isGiven

        public abstract boolean isGiven(int row,
                                int col)
        Checks a cell to see if the value is a given value used to enter the board or a player entered value.
        Parameters:
        row - Row number of desired cell.
        col - Col number of desired cell.
        Returns:
        True if number is given value, false if empty or player provided.
